main event: A civilian observer reported seeing a cylindrical object estimated to be 75 feet in diameter near Ellsworth AFB, South Dakota on January 10, 1966.
interesting points: The object made a 90 degree turn and flew back into the clouds,The observer was a civilian working with base Civil Engineers,The object was identified as a KC-135 based on radar records,The sighting lasted for one minute during daylight,The object showed bright flashes of light which drew attention to it.
